name: Tetruum
description:
A tetris variant, where your aim is to not to fill up all the rows, leave an opening around the shape that you see on the level.

web version: https://itch.io/embed-upload/2444616?color=333333

3 and 6 hour builds are in the repository bellow.

Made for the 2020-07 triple trijam.
https://itch.io/jam/triple-trijam-2020

Used themes:

  1. Chain Reaction
  2. Negative Feedback Loop
  3. Novel Twist on Classic Game

Diversifiers: 

Design 🎲: 

  •    uses randomness

Code 💻

  • Upload the source code of your project to your game's itch.io page!

Meta 🎮

  • Make a game in a genre you've never made a game in before!

Assets used:  https://kenney.nl/assets/puzzle-pack

Music is from here (license gained through humble bundle) https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/big-casual-arcade-game-music-bundle-157671

Source+ older builds:

https://github.com/Frontrider/Tetruum
